api_list.api_description: Find representatives and boundaries by postal code, optionally limiting results to a specific boundary set.

required_parameters.name: postal_code
required_parameters.description: The postal code for lookup, formatted in uppercase with no spaces.

optional_parameters.name: sets
optional_parameters.description: Comma-separated list of boundary sets to limit results.

query: I want to access the comprehensive election polls database for various polls in Germany. Additionally, can you provide information about representatives and boundaries for the postal code K1A0B1?
